messages.subject: Re: request for help with research
messages.msgSnippet: I did the survey and it didn t take too long at all. It is fun to sort the cards -- I am thinking of keeping them and having my husband look through them/sort
messages.messageBody:
I did the survey and it didn't take too long at all. It is fun to sort
the cards -- I am thinking of keeping them and having my husband look
through them/sort them. Thought they might be a good conversation
starter about parenting and future decisions we have to make for our
children. He still pretty much rolls his eyes and thinks I'm crazy if
he sees or hears the word "unschooling", but I am being patient and
biding my time. The funny part is how many things we do that are in
line with unschooling -- he just doesn't know it! I understand now
what people mean when they say that it just made sense to them to have
their kids at home, that it seemed like the natural progression to how
they were parenting...

Susan

messages.messageBody:
http://familyrun.ning.com/forum/topics/help-with-research-on

Two notes are there, and both lead to more stuff about the project,
but if you want to help with a research project, there's a link in
the upper right hand of
http://demifrog.com

Sandra
